member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Internal.SqliteStrings.InvalidMigrationOperation
member.summary: SQLite cannot support this migration operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Internal.SqliteStrings.MigrationScriptGenerationNotSupported
member.summary: Generating idempotent scripts for migration is not currently supported by SQLite.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Storage.Internal.SqliteTypeMapper.GetMapping(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a clr type for a SQLite column type. Defaults to typeof(string). It uses the same heuristics from "2.1 Determination of Column Affinity"
